name: SeekSeek: A Hide & Seek Adventure
description:
A multiplayer hide & seek adventure set in the world of Earthbound!

Inspired by an old Earthbound fan game called Seek and Tag

⚠ NOTE:  This game is still in development and you will find bugs!  Please leave a comment on this page describing any bugs if you feel like it! ⚠

Gameplay

This game requires at least 2 people to play! I recommend using some voice chat to coordinate!

One person is the seeker and they have only one job: Find and tag all the hiders

The hiders need to find items, and bring them to statues which are also hidden in various buildings, while avoiding the seeker!

Once a hider is tagged, they become a zombie.  Zombies slow down anyone near them, but they can still continue their quest!  If everyone becomes a zombie, it's game over for the hiders.

Online Multiplayer

Easily host and join public online games!  Currently supports up to 10 players per match. You can also connect via direct IP.

Customize the rules for your lobby if you want to tweak the challenge!

Credits

Obviously almost everything in this game is from Earthbound/Mother2.  It is all made with love and with no intention of profit please don't shut me down!

Other graphics provided by:

  • https://www.deviantart.com/murphmario - EB sprite rips
  • https://gerald-burke.itch.io/geralds-keys - keyboard graphics
  • https://pixeltier.itch.io/pixeltiers-food-rpg-icon-set - item pickups
  • https://ghazi.itch.io/skilliconpack - skill icons
  • https://nvph-studio.itch.io/free-9-icons-skill-rpg-16x16-and-32x32 - skill icons
